title: "We have to harden our schools, not soften them up": Trump
text:
"We have to harden our schools, not soften them up": Trump 7:20pm EST - 02:23 
  on Thursday emphasized that he wants to see trained teachers able to carry concealed guns to ward off potential school shooters, adding that a gun-free zone to a killer is like ''going in for the ice cream.''   on Thursday emphasized that he wants to see trained teachers able to carry concealed guns to ward off potential school shooters, adding that a gun-free zone to a killer is like "going in for the ice cream."  //reut.rs/2EN2ZcA
